title: Delicious Food and Excellent Service
body: Me and my friends enjoyed the food here, especially the bestsellers, Beef Tapa with Egg, Honey Buffalo Wings.. and I also loved their Mango Fruitshake üíó The food look so appetizing and are indeed well-seasoned. The waiters were also kind and welcoming to us. The service was on-time. We gave a tip to themüòä

title: Quality with Variety of Foods
body: By the look and taste of the food, I can say that the ingredients are all fresh and of good quality, hence the food ought to be tasty. The many times I visit this restaurant, I order different food items because of the variety there is, which I like. Not only do I eat lunch here, but I also come her during merienda time to eat some pastries from their mini-bakery or street foods whenever I crave. The line for the Shakes is always long when I come hence I haven't tried it yet but will surely do soon üòã I also like that the staff keep the indoor seating area always clean since I enjoy eating my food in a hygienic place.

title: The Top Restaurant in DLSU!
body: This is certainly my favorite food place in DLSU. So convenient to eat in the campus with food that tastes close to one's home, so gooooood. I don't have to go out anymore and the prices are not bad for anyone on a budget. The service is great. My personal favorite is the Chicken Cordon Bleu...chef's kissüòò

title: Tastes Great!
body: I honestly never ate a waffle before. The experience was something new and I liked it. The Cream Cheese Waffle was good...but I did found the long wait bothering especially if you have an upcoming class. Not really convenient but suggested for those who have time to kill.

title: Great Breakfast Option
body: There are many flavors which make it hard to pick but I would definitely like to taste them all üôÇ I watched them make the waffle on the spot and not only does it make it mouth-watering, but their service is clean. Even though I had to wait for so long, it was worth it.

title: All Health Conscious, Listen!
body: This restaurant is perfect for those who are health conscious like me. The vegetables and meat are well-cooked. Healthy food can be tasty indeed and they prove this üòÑ My favorite is the Grilled Tuna Meal with Sweet Potato.. Yuuum! Plus, their service is also quick thanks to the kind staffüòç

title: Good food but need more seasoning
body: The food was good but I found that the seasoning was a bit lacking. Moreover, it was also well-prepared and served in a container. I also drank their honey lemon juice and I can guarantee it was fresh.

title: Coldness can ruin the experience
body: Don't get me wrong. I love their food and the taste is pleasant, but they could certainly warm the meals up for a more enjoyable eating experience..just a suggestion hehe ü§ó

title: I love to eat my veggies!
body: Boiled veggies are nice. They suit well with the grilled meals, but a different approach to cooking the veggies could definitely elevate the taste of the meals. No longer need to add soy sauce on my veggies hahahahaha

title: Good enough snack
body: One of the meriendas I usually eat in the campus. My favorite is Beef Pinatubo üíó Just a good enough snack, fresh, with the right amount of filling. Although I have noticed that their serving size is getting small and smaller.

title: All-time favorite snack
body: I love eating fries.. theirs is my favorite snack of all-time. Just the perfect kind of crisp. I like the barbeque flavor.

title: Great to eat for all potato lovers!
body: Potato lover here! üòÑ I tried the cheesy bacon potpots and fries, cheese flavor, and they do taste incredible. However, they got soggy too fast, which kind of ruined the experience for me.

title: Quick Dessert
body: First time I tried Aice.. I was surprised with the multiple flavours available. I wasn't able to pick one quick as much I was able to smash that dessert .üòã I ate the Chocolate Crispy one and it was delightful. Would surely buy again and try another flavour!

title: Just the right amount of sweet
body: The ice-cream was a craving satisfier, although it was not that creamy. I tried the Milk Melon one and found it a little bit watery. But the taste was bomb though, not that sweet, just fine. It is also affordable.
